Item.Line: Hey, player... I know you are determined to leave, no matter what I say...
Yes, sister, I have made up my mind.
But! At least take this with you... You don't have to thank me, this belongs to your father.
Father... I will become as good as you are. No, I will surpass you.
Hey player... Can you wave that baton one last time... for me? I will play my favorite piece: Air on G String.
